title: PBL Science Course Design Based on Higher Education Assessment Design Profiles

context.prior_knowledge: Elementary scientific experimentation methods and introductory elementary education principles
context.additional_context: Project-based learning course aimed at strengthening science education assessment design competencies in BYOD environments

learning_goals: Learners can design assessment methods aligned with given learning outcomes through think-aloud simulation
Learners can analyze alignment relationships among learning outcomes, instructional methods, and feasibility when designing assessments
Learners can propose feasible assessment strategies in resource-constrained environments
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
